The internet needs more cats. DNS servers are the authority on all things internet. Therefore, the best DNS server is the one that resolves everything to cats. This talk is about that.

We‚Äôre going to walk through the basics and find out how DNS servers work, how you can talk to a DNS server if you‚Äôre a browser, and how to talk back to a browser if you are a DNS server.
